text.textblock: Part of A-368 described as follows: Beginning at the Northeast corner of said A-368; Thence, S. 03
’ E., 1200 feet, along the East line of said A-368; Thence, S. 88

W., 1300 feet, along the East right-of-way line of U.S. Highway 69 and 287; Thence, Easterly, approximately 1200 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning at the point of intersection of the West right-of-way line of U.S. Highway 69 and 287 with the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 10

E., 1750 feet, along the West right-of-way line of U.S. Highway 69 and 287 to the point of intersection of said West right-of-way of U.S. Highway 69 and 287 with the East right-of-way line of the Southern Pacific Railroad; Thence, N. 20

W., 1800 feet, along the East right-of-way line of the Southern Pacific Railroad; Thence, Easterly, approximately 250 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning at the Northwest corner of said A-368; Thence, Easterly, approximately 1250 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 20
E., 1200 feet, along the Westerly right-of-way line of Southern Pacific Railroad; Thence, S. 88
W., 1050 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-436 described as follows: Beginning at the Northeast corner of said A-436; Thence, S. 03
E., 700 feet, along the East line of said A-436; Thence, N. 49
W., 2000 feet; Thence, West, 2250 feet; Thence, N. 03
W., 2700 feet, along the East line of the tract of land now or formerly owned by G.D. Flowers, A-436-6; Thence, S. 87
W., 1300 feet, along the North line of said A-436-6; Thence, N. 03
W., 1600 feet, along the West line of said A-436; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 9000 feet along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-851 described as follows: Beginning on the West line of said A-851 at a point which lies N. 03
W., 1150 feet, from the Southwest corner of said A-851; Thence, N. 03
W., 250 feet, along the West line of said A-851; Thence, Northeasterly, approximately 4000 feet along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 03
E., 1600 feet, along the East line of said A-851; Thence, S. 87
W., 1250 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-434 described as follows: Beginning at the Southwest corner of A-434; Thence, N. 03
W., 500 feet, along the West line of said A-434; Thence, N. 45
E., 900 feet; Thence, Northwesterly and Southwesterly, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-366 described as follows: Beginning at the Southwest corner of said A-366; Thence, N. 04
W., 1000 feet, along the West line of said A-366; Thence, S. 82
E., 1300 feet, along the East line of said A-366; Thence, Westerly, approximately 4500 feet along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-85 described as follows: Beginning at the Northwest corner of said A-85; Thence, Easterly, approximately 3500 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 04
E., 350 feet, along the East line of said A-85; Thence, N. 86
W., 850 feet, along the West line of said A-85, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-279 described as follows: Beginning at the Southwest corner of said A-279; Thence, N. 04
W., 2000 feet, along the West line of said A-279; Thence, S. 59
E., 1000 feet, along the East line of said A-279; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 3000 feet along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-76 described as follows: Beginning at the Northeast corner of said A-76; Thence, S. 02
E., 850 feet along the East line of said A-76; Thence, N. 38
W., 600 feet, along the West line of said A-76; Thence, Southeasterly, 2500 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of said A-266 described as follows: Beginning at the Southwest corner of said A-266; Thence, N. 03
W., 1300 feet, along the West line of said A-266; Thence, S. 75
E., 2000 feet, along the East line of said A-266; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 3250 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-65 described as follows: Beginning at the Northeast corner of said A-65; Thence, S. 03
E., 600 feet, along the East line of said A-65, Thence, S. 87
W., 350 feet, along the West line of said A-65; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 3000 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
